page.title: 02HENHAM STEAM RALLY
page.content: Henham Steam Rally is a kind of fete which at the moment is held once a year in Henham Park.This year it was fairly hot on both Saturday and Sunday .It is best to come in the morning when it is not so crowded.There where almost 120 stalls and 30 steam engines this year.There are fairground rides,a steam boat, and machines all run by steam.The galloping horses is the best ride.I won three cuddly toys which I called Felix,Jeremy and Pinkers. My mum ran the CND stall.I spent five pounds on rides,stalls and a hot dog a sausage in a bread roll.About twelve thousand people came from all over East Anglia to the rally.The new earl sent a tape recording from Australia to open the rally.There were rides in a helecopter costing eight pounds for five minutes.There were very long traffic jams on the A12.
